  • Constructor Details

    • PromotionalSet

      public PromotionalSet​(int setId, String setName, ArrayList<AlaCarte> alaCarteList, double price, String description)
      Create a promotional set with its unique id, name, individual alaCarte items, price and description
      Parameters:
      setId - unique identifier of the set
      setName - the set name
      alaCarteList - the alaCarteList of alaCarte items
      price - the price of the set
      description - the description of the set
